PES doesn't care about CET. They've started without CET kids in the past. It can definitely happen again.
Hello
But if first round results are not released then how is first round over. Pesu are waiting for it to finish right

PES *usually* waits for the first round to end, but in the past they've also gone ahead and started classes for PESSAT kids without CET's round 1 because the latter was extremely delayed. So yes it *can* happen if PES wants it to happen because they've done so in the past. Whether they do the same this year is up to them.
Is it getting extremely delayed this time

Probably has not reached "extremely" delayed yet, given that they can still start the semester in the third week of August if they wanted to (based on the article). But anything beyond September first week is extremely delayed.
So you also think it might get started in September but possibility to start in August also is what you are trying to say
